author: Brad Hoag
comment: Random launches app on LG Urbane or maybe all smartwatches . At least on mine it opens all the time . Hate when I'm not flying and love when I'm in the air. Unfortunately it opens randomly more than I fly.... every time I look at my smart watch the app is open and nothing is open on my phone...
title: Launches Randomly

author: Lakis Andever
comment: Use it all the time. It does turn off on its own though and that is annoying. Running on lg g watch r
title: Love it. Works good but...

author: Zaránd Duska
comment: What time are you planning to release it for android wear 2.0 as well? I'm running wear 2 on my huawei watch but this version is not working with it?! thanks very much

author: Kirk Souder
comment: I bought this thinking it would work with Samsung Gear watch. I want my money back.
title: Doesn't work with Samsung Gear

author: Jimmy Clarke
comment: I can't seems to get it to work on my gear s3 smart watch any help

author: Rohit Kawalay
comment: Does not wok with Samsung Gear2 Neo

author: Roberts Onkelis
comment: Excellent flight tool that I was waiting for my smartwatch and great comunication from the developer!
title: Great tool!
